name: Forensic Master
description:
Solve crime cases and become a forensic master!

Varying minigames will bring excitement and satisfaction to your life.
You will encounter cases in funeral homes, morgues and the streets. Use your brain to help catch criminals and bring them to justice.

They need you! Can you solve all the mysteries?
publishers: RUBY OYUN VE YAZILIM DANISMANLIK SANAYI TICARET LIMITED SIRKETI
